display_information.name: Peerbot
display_information.description: Hire AI peers to work with you, using your environments
display_information.long_description: This bot integrates Claude Code SDK with Slack to provide AI-powered coding assistance directly in your workspace. You can generate apps/AI peers that will appear as new handles.

assistant_view.assistant_description: It can generate Claude Code session working on public Github data

suggested_prompts.title: Setup peers
suggested_prompts.message: List all the subagents in Claude and explain when they're triggered. Confirm with the user the changes and apply them to projects ./claude/agents/ directory and CLAUDE.md file.

suggested_prompts.title: Create a project
suggested_prompts.message: Create a new project. If there is no subagent, suggest user run setup peers first. Ask user the type of the project and gather information to create a new project.

suggested_prompts.title: Start working on a new feature/bug
suggested_prompts.message: List me projects and let me tell you what I want to develop on which project

suggested_prompts.title: Be creative âœ¨
suggested_prompts.message: Look at the existing projects; if there are none, let me create a new project. If there is only one project, switch to that project and and if it's a web server, run it and expose it with Cloudflare anonymous tunnel proxy.
